quote: “You’re off to great places, today is your day. Your mountain is waiting, so get on your way.”
name: Dr. Seuss
title: Author/Poet

quote: “You always pass failure on the way to success.”
name: Mickey Rooney
title: Actor

quote: “No one is perfect - that’s why pencils have erasers.”
name: Wolfgang Riebe
title: Keynote Speaker/Magician

quote: “Winning doesn’t always mean being first. Winning means you’re doing better than you’ve done before.”
name: Bonnie Blair
title: Speed Skater

quote: “You’re braver than you believe, and stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.”
name: A.A. Mine
title: Author/Poet

quote: “It always seems impossible until it is done.”
name: Nelson Mandela
title: Political Leader

quote: “Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.”
name: Helen Keller
title: Author

quote: “Once you replace negative thoughts with positive ones, you’ll start having positive results.”
name: Willie Nelson
title: Musician

quote: “Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will.”
name: Zig Ziglar
title: Author

quote: “In every day, there are 1,440 minutes. That means we have 1,440 daily opportunities to make a positive impact.”
name: Les Brown
title: Author

quote: “The only time you fail is when you fall down and stay down.”
name: Stephen Richards
title: Author

quote: “When you are enthusiastic about what you do, you feel this positive energy. It’s very simple.”
name: Paulo Coelho
title: Brazilian lyricist

quote: “Positive anything is better than negative nothing.”
name: Elbert Hubbard
title: Writer

quote: “Winning is fun, but those moments that you can touch someone’s life in a very positive way are better.”
name: Tim Howard
title: Soccer Player

quote: “Virtually nothing is impossible in this world if you just put your mind to it and maintain a positive attitude.”
name: Lou Holtz
title: Former Football Player

quote: “Optimism is a happiness magnet. If you stay positive good things and good people will be drawn to you.”
name: Mary Lou Retton
title: Gymnast

quote: “It makes a big difference in your life when you stay positive.”
name: Ellen DeGeneres
title: Comedian

quote: “If opportunity doesn’t knock, build a door.”
name: Milton Berle
title: Comedian

quote: “Happiness is an attitude. We either make ourselves miserable, or happy and strong. The amount of work is the same.”
name: Francesca Reigler
title: Artist

quote: “You are never too old to set another goal or dream a new dream.”
name: Les Brown
title: Author

quote: “The sun himself is weak when he first rises, and gathers strength and courage as the day gets on.”
name: Charles Dickens
title: Author

quote: “It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.”
name: Vince Lombardi
title: Football player

quote: “The struggle you’re in today is developing the strength you need tomorrow.”
name: Robert Tew
title: Writer

quote: “The way I see it, if you want the rainbow, you gotta put up with the rain.”
name: Dolly Parton
title: Singer-Songwriter

quote: “Every day may not be good... but there’s something good in every day.”
name: Alice Morse Earle
title: American Historian

quote: “The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.”
name: Oprah Winfrey
title: Actress, TV Host

quote: “Hard work keeps the wrinkles out of the mind and spirit.”
name: Helena Rubinstein
title: American-Polish Businesswoman

quote: “The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.”
name: Jimmy Johnson
title: Football Coach

quote: “Let your unique awesomeness and positive energy inspire confidence in others.”
name: Anonymous

quote: “Wherever you go, no matter what the weather, always bring your own sunshine.”
name: Anthony J. D’Angelo
title: Author

quote: “If you want light to come into your life, you need to stand where it is shining.”
name: Guy Finley
title: Writer

quote: “Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day in and day out.”
name: Robert Collier
title: Author

quote: “Happiness is the only thing that multiplies when you share it.”
name: Albert Schweitzer
title: Theologian

quote: “When we are open to new possibilities, we find them. Be open and skeptical of everything.”
name: Todd Kashdan
title: Scientist

quote: “The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.”
name: Marcus Aurelius
title: Roman Emperor

quote: “The good life is a process, not a state of being. It is a direction, not a destination. ”
name: Carl Rogers
title: Psychologist

quote: “Be so happy that, when other people look at you, they become happy too.”
name: Anonymous

quote: “A truly happy person is one who can enjoy the scenery while on a detour.”
name: Anonymous

quote: “Live life to the fullest and focus on the positive.”
name: Matt Cameron
title: Musician
